original_text: And I will call for a sword against him throughout all my mountains, saith the Lord God: every man's sword shall be against his brother.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 내가 내 모든 산 중에서 그를 칠 칼을 부르리니 각 사람이 칼로 그 형제를 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will call for a sword against him
every man's sword shall be against his brother
